title: 3 and Out - SF/K.C. Lack of Ego; Chiefs GM Brett Veach Talks Niners, Reid Relationship; Picking Mahomes; 24-0 Texans Comeback
itunes:title: 3 and Out - SF/K.C. Lack of Ego; Chiefs GM Brett Veach Talks Niners, Reid Relationship; Picking Mahomes; 24-0 Texans Comeback
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff is in Miami and sits down with Kansas City Chiefs GM Brett Veach. They discuss his relationship with Andy Reid, GM pressure, his thoughts after falling behind 24-0 to the Texans, the impact of the Honey Badger on the defense, when he was sold on Mahomes, what he sees with San Francisco, and why he's impressed by Jimmy Garoppolo. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
